test_principles.title: AI Safety Principle
test_principles.description: Fundamental safety requirements for AI systems
test_principles.content: AI systems must prioritize human safety and well-being in all operations. No action should be taken that could reasonably lead to harm to humans or critical infrastructure.
test_principles.normative_statement: SHALL ensure that all AI operations maintain human safety as the highest priority
test_principles.rationale: Human safety is the foundational requirement for any AI system deployment

test_principles.title: Data Privacy Protection
test_principles.description: Comprehensive data privacy and protection requirements
test_principles.content: Personal and sensitive data must be protected through encryption, access controls, and privacy-preserving techniques. Data collection and processing must comply with applicable privacy regulations.
test_principles.normative_statement: SHALL protect all personal and sensitive data through appropriate technical and organizational measures
test_principles.rationale: Privacy protection is essential for maintaining user trust and regulatory compliance

test_principles.title: Algorithmic Fairness
test_principles.description: Requirements for fair and unbiased AI decision-making
test_principles.content: AI systems must make decisions fairly without discrimination based on protected characteristics. Regular bias testing and mitigation measures must be implemented.
test_principles.normative_statement: SHALL ensure fair treatment and non-discrimination in all automated decisions
test_principles.rationale: Fairness is fundamental to ethical AI deployment and social acceptance

test_principles.title: Transparency and Explainability
test_principles.description: Requirements for AI system transparency and decision explainability
test_principles.content: AI systems must provide clear explanations for their decisions, especially in high-stakes scenarios. Users must understand how decisions affecting them are made.
test_principles.normative_statement: SHALL provide clear and understandable explanations for AI-driven decisions
test_principles.rationale: Transparency builds trust and enables accountability in AI systems

test_principles.title: System Reliability and Robustness
test_principles.description: Requirements for reliable and robust AI system operation
test_principles.content: AI systems must operate reliably under various conditions and gracefully handle edge cases and unexpected inputs. Failure modes must be predictable and safe.
test_principles.normative_statement: SHALL maintain reliable operation and safe failure modes under all conditions
test_principles.rationale: Reliability is essential for AI systems deployed in critical applications
